author: Frank Miles
title: Lululemon apologizes after art director promotes 'bat fried rice' T-shirt during coronavirus
description: Fitness apparel brand Lululemon is apologizing, according to a report, for a senior staffer online promoting a T-shirt design for “bat fried rice” during the coronavirus pandemic.
content:

Fitness apparel brand Lululemon is apologizing after a senior staffer promoted a T-shirt design for “bat fried rice” during the coronavirus pandemic.
